mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBSCRIPT(subNo, memberNo, subStart, subEnd, subType, paid_amount, memo, imp_uid, merchant_uid, paid_at, pg_tid, firstMail) VALUES(subscript_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, TO_DATE(#{subStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#{subEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{subType}, #{paid_amount}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imp_uid}, #{merchant_uid}, TO_DATE(#{paid_at}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{pg_tid}, TO_DATE(#{firstMail}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT subNo, nickName, email, TO_CHAR(subStart,'YYYY-MM-DD') subStart, TO_CHAR(subEnd,'YYYY-MM-DD') subEnd, TO_CHAR(firstMail,'YYYY-MM-DD') firstMail, subType, paid_amount, imp_uid, merchant_uid, TO_CHAR(paid_at,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:MM') paid_at, pg_tid, CASE WHEN subEnd >= sysdate then 1 WHEN subEnd < sysdate then -1 ELSE 0 END AS endOrNot FROM SUBSCRIPT s JOIN MEMBER m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE s.memberNo = #{memberNo} ORDER BY paid_amount DESC

SELECT subNo, nickName, email, TO_CHAR(subStart,'YYYY-MM-DD') subStart, TO_CHAR(subEnd,'YYYY-MM-DD') subEnd, TO_CHAR(firstMail,'YYYY-MM-DD') firstMail, subType, paid_amount, imp_uid, merchant_uid, TO_CHAR(paid_at,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:MM') paid_at, pg_tid, CASE WHEN subEnd >= sysdate then 1 WHEN subEnd < sysdate then -1 ELSE 0 END AS endOrNot FROM SUBSCRIPT s JOIN MEMBER m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE s.memberNo = #{memberNo} and subType = #{selectSub} ORDER BY paid_amount DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM subscript s JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE s.memberNo = #{memberNo}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM subscript s JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE s.memberNo = #{memberNo} and subType = #{selectSub}

SELECT subNo, nickName, email, TO_CHAR(subStart,'YYYY-MM-DD') subStart, TO_CHAR(subEnd,'YYYY-MM-DD') subEnd, TO_CHAR(firstMail,'YYYY-MM-DD') firstMail, subType, paid_amount, imp_uid, merchant_uid, TO_CHAR(paid_at,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:MM') paid_at, pg_tid, CASE WHEN subEnd >= sysdate then 1 WHEN subEnd < sysdate then -1 ELSE 0 END AS endOrNot FROM SUBSCRIPT s JOIN MEMBER m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE imp_uid = #{imp_uid}

SELECT subNo, email, s.memberNo, nickName, TO_CHAR(subStart,'YYYY-MM-DD') subStart, TO_CHAR(subEnd,'YYYY-MM-DD') subEnd FROM subscript s JOIN member m ON m.memberNo = s.memberNo WHERE SYSDATE >= subStart AND SYSDATE <= subEnd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBMAIL(mailNo, subNo, title, content, sendDate) VALUES(submail_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subNo}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
